kernel
Interface AgentRegistrar

All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardAgentRegistrar
public interface AgentRegistrar

Implementations of this decide which entities are controlled by agents and what each agent can see on startup.

Method Summary
 void registerAgents(WorldModel<? extends Entity> world, Config config, ComponentManager manager)
          Process a WorldModel and Config and tell the ComponentManager which entities are agent-controlled and what they can see on connection.
 

Method Detail

registerAgents

void registerAgents(WorldModel<? extends Entity> world,
                    Config config,
                    ComponentManager manager)
                    throws KernelException
Process a WorldModel and Config and tell the ComponentManager which entities are agent-controlled and what they can see on connection.

Parameters:
world - The WorldModel.
config - The Config.
manager - The ComponentManager.
Throws:
KernelException - If there is a problem registering agents.
